mapper.update:
UPDATE store_stock_change_apply
store_product_unit_id = #{storeProductUnitId},
stock_change = #{stockChange},
before_change_value = #{beforeChangeValue},
after_change_value = #{afterChangeValue},
apply_cause_id = #{applyCauseId},
concreteness_cause = #{concretenessCause},
after_user_id = #{afterUserId},
after_user_name = #{afterUserName},
after_store_id = #{afterStoreId},
after_store_name = #{afterStoreName},
after_time = #{afterTime},
operation_user_id = #{operationUserId},
operation_user_name = #{operationUserName},
operation_time = #{operationTime},
is_consent = #{isConsent},
platform_id = #{platformId},
commodity_product_unit_name = #{commodityProductUnitName},
product_unit_serial_number = #{productUnitSerialNumber},
type = #{type},
WHERE id = #{id}
